data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ronderos, María M., Marino, Pablo I., Díaz, Florentina (2012): Description of the pupa and male of Paryphoconus grandis Macfie (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae). Zootaxa 3242: 39-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.208620
